question: [Check] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (178, 205), (152, 163), (162, 118).

qas.question: [Check] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (178, 205), (152, 163), (162, 118).
[Rapid] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (178, 205), (152, 163), (162, 118). Provide only the area.
[Challenge] Norsk: Finn areal og omkrets for trekanten med punktene (178, 205), (152, 163), (162, 118). Provide only the perimeter.
